short_summary: Temporary Help Service against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region
description: This requirement is for the Department of National Defense. The Procurement is for Temporary Help Service against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region. The Department has a level of security requirement: Secret. The Request for Proposal has been invited to the supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the following streams and categories: Stream 5.1- Computer Application Support.
duration_in_months: After the winning bid has been selected.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Notice

***
## Tender Details
### Notice Title
Temporary Computer Application Support - Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)
### Reference Number
CB 551-90825345
### Solicitation Number
S4775659
### Publication Date
December 20, 2023
### Tender Closing Date
December 28, 2023, 14:00:00

## Contracting Entity
- **Client Name**
Department of National Defense
- **Address**
60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H 8G1
- **Country**
Canada

## Tender Description
The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking temporary computer application support through the issuance of a Request for Proposal (RFP) to suppliers registered under the Supply Arrangement (EN578-172870) for Computer Application Support. The requirement is for Temporary Help Services, which can be offered by qualified suppliers who are registered under the above stream and category.

## Security Requirement
Resource(s) with a minimum Security Level Required is/are: Secret

## Selection Criteria
Variations or combinations of the above methods

## Tender Status
Expired (Tender Closed)
## Notice URL (Information Package)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28082/s4775659-rfp-%28english.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28082/s4775659--dp-%28french.pdf)
## Contact Information
CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 971-7955
## Trade Agreements
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
## Regions of Opportunity
- National Capital Region (NCR)
### Regions of Delivery
- National Capital Region (NCR)

## Attachment
The full tender notice or RFP can be downloaded from the above link provided, which includes detailed specifications of the requirement and instructions for supplier registration and proposal submission. Please note that only supplier(s) registered under EN578-172870 for Computer Application Support and who meet the specified security requirements may submit a proposal.
